column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The service was one of the lows of my experience here. Maybe it was because we were sitting near the back of the bar
column2: but I'd still expect better service given that when we arrived
column3: the place was relatively empty. We had to hail the bartender several times to get his attention to order more food
column4: and often it felt like he was ignoring us. The wait times on our orders were decent
column5: so no major complaints there. One of us checked in on yelp to claim the free dessert
column7: but the bill that was handed to us to sign
column8: had that dessert on the bill (charged to us). We noticed the bill discrepancy
column9: and it was only after we asked our bartender that he changed this for us.
